Reimagining How Nigerians Pay, One Bill at a Time

At Billa, we're building more than just a payment app; we're creating a smarter, simpler way for everryday Nigerians to stay connected, pay their bills and take control of their financial lives.

Why We Started

We created Billa because we saw a real problem: people struggling with too many apps, missed due dayes, and unreliable payment platforms.

So we built one app that brings it all together - electricity, internet, school fees, airtime and even a virtual dollar card. Add Billa AI, and you've got the smartest payment experience available today.

Our Mission & Vision

Mission: To make bills payment effortless, intelligent, and accessible for everyone across Nigeria - no matter their background or tech level

Vision: A future where anyone can manage their financial life from one simple, secure platform - powered by smart automation and trust.

Our Core Values

Simplicity

Payments should be fast, clear, and easy - no stress.

Trust

Your data and money are protected by real-time security and compliance.

Innovation

We use smart tools like Billa AI to make bill payments smarter everyday.

People First

Everything we build starts with our users' needs and experience in mind.

Ready to simplify your biils?
Download Billa and experirence the smarter way to pay

Our all-in-one app for bills, airtime, data, and smart payments — powered by Billia AI
